author: jvermillard
msg: fixed release tarballs, removed old modules, added new ones

author: jeremias
msg: Fix for plan reloader when the namespace doesn't match.
Added a viewBox attribute to the generated SVG so scaling is done properly when embedded in another SVG file.

author: reinhard
msg: Can't release as long as the Daisy plugin is a SNAPSHOT

author: jeremias
msg: Refinements based on the extensions of XML Graphics Commons (better distinction of the various image flavors).
Added an image converter from Java2D to SVG (using Batik's SVGGraphics2D).
